Text:
Thanks Secludedly!

Whoa! 9.34 Gigs?!?

That's even bigger than usual
is this PW protected like that sir paul crap?
7h - 0.8%. Hehe. This is slow. Feels like we are very few who seed when we leech. To bad UFC doesn't have any easyer way for us to get it. I would pay for it.

@kjhgviyvoiyoi 
Visit my website and look about 5 posts down. You'll  see what you're looking for.
Hi man, thanks alot for this i thought you didnt encode PPV´s because they costed alot of money... what happened on this one?, i am very surprised thanks alot again.

Best release! It might be too big for someone, but that quality is worth it. 60 FPS Excellence!!! 

...and it´s not PW protected.

Why the .ts file extension ?
A lot of people have not come across that before - I have heard you can just rename it to mpg but if so, why not upload this as an mpg file ?   My problem is that it does NOT playback Audio with my PS3 using PS3 media server.  So although psyched to watch this - I ended up downloading the MP4 version at 1/4th the bandwidth.  I probably should have tried the renaming trick to see if audio would play.

The BEST release so far. Totally worth it. Thank you.

For ALL THE PEOPLE who are uncomfortable with the size can checkout other versions of the uploads, there is just no need for yapping about it. 

9GiB is absolutely alright. I would love it if you keep this quality of video for all the forth coming UFC Events please.
Regards.
